ygData.subject: Re: Stein - An update from EQCasters
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe shoddy cut and paste job heh - Baels ... From: mstokes  To:  Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 12:12 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe shoddy cut and paste job heh

- Baels

----- Original Message -----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 12:12 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein - An update from EQCasters


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Just a cut and paste from EQCasters. I hope you don't mind Baelish :)
>
>
> MORE ON THE GLOWING STEIN</FONT></STRONG><P><FONT face="Arial"><SMALL>More
> details for you on the stein. The new <B>Stein of Moggok</B> as well as
> being a 7/43 1 Hand Blunt Weapon does still retain the <B>Glowing
Stein</B>
> bonuses of +10 Int +5 Dex +10 HP and +20 sv Disease.<P>
> GM's have confirmed the Quest difficulty is also being increased when the
> new item is implemented. One great side effect of this is that you can
now
> wield the stein in a primary melee slot (since its primary only) and be
> safe from the charm-morph bug.<P>
> This is actually an improvement of the item. Those lucky enough to have
> both a Glowing Black Sphere and a Stein have hit the jackpot now.
Complete
> safety near charming monsters and 19 int. Combining with the Crude Stein
> is also popular with Enchanters.<P>
> I would advise getting a stein before the patch if you want one though
> because Verant's definition of "harder" can be an understatement (eg:
Plane
> of Fear)
>
>
